hero_description: Daawa is a platform to manage your events, invite guests, and track attendance.
hero_description_refined: Create, manage, and share your events effortlessly. Send beautiful invitations and track RSVPs with ease.
features_heading_refined: Everything You Need for Seamless Event Management
feature_1_desc: Easily create and manage event details, including drafts and activation.
feature_1_desc_refined: Easily manage +N guest allowances, offer self-registration via shareable links, and import existing guest lists.
feature_2_desc: Handle guest lists, invitations, and RSVP tracking with our intuitive tools.
feature_2_desc_refined: Design beautiful, branded digital passes for PDF, Apple Wallet, and Google Wallet, all from a unified interface.
feature_3_desc: Streamline event entry with QR code scanning and real-time attendance updates.
feature_3_desc_refined: Utilize any smartphone or tablet for fast QR code scanning with our web-based check-in module. No extra hardware needed.
cta_heading_refined: Simplify Your Next Event with Daawa
cta_desc: Join now and experience seamless event management.
cta_desc_refined: Focus on your event, not the logistics. Start exploring Daawa's features today in 'Draft' mode â€“ no commitment required.

login_failed_unknown: An unknown error occurred during login.
forgot_password_generic_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
forgot_password_instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
registration_failed_unknown: An unknown error occurred during registration.
forgot_password_email_sent_generic: If your email address exists in our system, you will receive a password reset link shortly.
reset_password_no_token_error: No reset token provided or token is invalid.
reset_password_generic_error: Failed to reset password. The link may be invalid or expired.
reset_password_invalid_token_message: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
reset_password_success_message: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in.
verify_email_success_message: Email verified successfully! You can now proceed to login.
verify_email_error_message: Email verification failed. The link may be invalid or expired.
verify_email_token_not_found: Verification token not found. Please check the link or request a new one.
resend_verification_email_sent: If your email is registered and unverified, a new verification link has been sent.
resend_verification_failed_to_resend: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again.
